children.functionDescription: Generates the next node step in the path.
Make sure the current node is within bounds.
Generates the next subnode step in the path.
Generates the next subsubnode step in the path.
All nodes have been generated and tile generation can begin.
Generate tiles based on the path nodes.
Removes redundant walls and adds physical tiles.
